scripts.start: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const env = { ...process.env, ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX: '1' }; const child = spawn('electron', ['.'], { stdio: 'inherit', env }); const shutdown = (signal) => { if (!child.killed) child.kill(signal); }; process.on('SIGINT', () => shutdown('SIGINT')); process.on('SIGTERM', () => shutdown('SIGTERM')); child.on('exit', (code, signal) => { if (signal === 'SIGINT') process.exit(0); process.exit(code ?? 0); });"
